name: Transcendence (itch) (Ledmondson17)
description: This is a narrative game that immerses the reader into an imaginary world with a vast elemental magic system, rich lore, and diverse abilities & attacks! Although this game is mostly narrative, it has game principles in the form of special attacks and abilities. If you enjoy storytelling and visiting imaginary worlds through prose, pictures, and other forms of media, then this is the perfect game for you!
